section.title: XPath
section.para: With the use of XPath is it possible to denote a certain location in a xml file. The location can be enclosed in an element or a field of an element. For XPath / counts as the root of the document. To separate elements you should use a '/' between those elements. In the case that you point to a field inside an element you should use 'element[@fieldname]'
